name: army-recruitment-platform
description: Multi-agent AI platform for army recruitment with personalized career paths, training, and community features

scripts.build:ordered: npm run build:shared && npm run build:agents && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:shared: if [ -d shared ]; then cd shared && npm run build && cd ..; else echo 'shared directory not found'; exit 1; fi
scripts.build:agents: if [ -d agents ]; then cd agents && npm run build && cd ..; else echo 'agents directory not found'; exit 1; fi
scripts.build:backend: if [ -d backend ]; then cd backend && npm run build && cd ..; else echo 'backend directory not found'; exit 1; fi
scripts.build:frontend: if [ -d frontend ]; then cd frontend && npm run build && cd ..; else echo 'frontend directory not found'; exit 1; fi
